name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial: EduConsult made my dream of studying at Harvard a reality. Their guidance through the application process was invaluable, and I couldn't have done it without their support.

name: Michael Chen
testimonial: The scholarship assistance I received helped me secure funding for my studies at Oxford. The team was professional and always available to answer my questions.

name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial: From university selection to visa application, EduConsult provided comprehensive support. I'm now pursuing my medical degree in Canada thanks to their expertise.

name: David Kumar
testimonial: The personalized counseling sessions helped me choose the right university and program. I'm grateful for the continuous support throughout my application journey.
